.. ref-constants

=========
Constants
=========

restless.constants
------------------

A set of constants included with ``restless``. Mostly nice status code mappings
for use in exceptions or the ``Resource.status_map``.

**OK** = ``200``

**CREATED** = ``201``

**ACCEPTED** = ``202``

**NO_CONTENT** = ``204``

**UNAUTHORIZED** = ``401``

**NOT_FOUND** = ``404``

**METHOD_NOT_ALLOWED** = ``405``

**APPLICATION_ERROR** = ``500``

**METHOD_NOT_IMPLEMENTED** = ``501``
